column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=BW : Yeah , and sometimes you ’ll actually hear stuff that you actually thought of during the audition , because you have to really be on your toes .
#Text=DS : Are you paid for that ?
#Text=BW : Not really .
#Text=Only a couple gigs did I ever get paid to scratch a movie for a celebrity that was going to do it .
#Text=The stuff that goes on at auditions is despicable .
#Text=DS : Are there legal remedies that you could pursue for that ?
#Text=BW : No.
#Text=I gotta prove it .
#Text=I used to bring a tape recorder around with me , but still , it ’s like trying to fight city hall .
#Text=It is what it is .
#Text=But that ’s my real issue with it is that this is an Area 51 for experienced voice-over people who do create characters and not just do who and what they are .
#Text=It takes away from the creative process .
#Text=DS : There was a similar issue involved with Crispin Glover .
#Text=They had taken a likeness of one of his earlier roles .
#Text=I think it was Robert Zemeckis
#Text=Then they tried to pass it off later as him and he sued them for doing that .
#Text=Are you familiar with that situation ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=It only means anything to me if he won .
#Text=DS : He did .
#Text=BW : Oh , he did !
#Text=That ’s very similar .
#Text=But the thing is , if you could prove that .
#Text=You ca n’t prove that somebody deliberately took the stuff and tossed it off to some person that ’s acting .
#Text=But it ’s a dirty business and I wo n’t do it anymore .
#Text=I never really quite got what it ’s all about .
#Text=It ’s to show up and to sound exactly like the character and to read it , yet you ’re doing it the way that you would do it .
#Text=It ’s not good business as far as I ’m concerned .
#Text=It ’s not my part of town .
#Text=DS : Has your speaking out on this issue hurt you in any way ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=In what way ?
#Text=DS : In your career ?
#Text=BW : No.
#Text=DS : There ’s no reaction against it from the studios or from the … . ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=No they do n’t give a shit which voice-over person is in the alleyways beating the piss out of the other one to get a gig .
#Text=I mean , they do n’t care .
#Text=They really do n’t .
#Text=Iconic characters and choosing projects
#Text=DS : You discussed in an interview issues about the weight of the character ’s legacies , such as Pop-Eye or Bugs Bunny .
#Text=You had said that every time they do one of these they say , ' this time it ’s going to be different .
#Text=We ’re putting the teeth back in those characters .
#Text=Nobody is going to tell us what we ca n’t write and what we can write . '
#Text=And you said they always blow it .
#Text=How do they blow it ?
